entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING, Resolute
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:53 p.m. MDT Thursday 4 May 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -2.4Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Resolute Airport 10:00 PM CDT Thursday 4 May 2023
Condition: Light Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -2.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 2 km
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -3.1°C
Wind: SE 28 km/h gust 39 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Thursday night: Blizzard. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending before morning then cloudy. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 60 km/h gusting to 80 becoming northeast 50 gusting to 70 this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 4 May 2023

entry.title: Friday: Clearing. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Blowing snow in the morning. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming north 20 in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 4 May 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Mainly sunny. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud after midnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 4 May 2023
